GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v5.15.56
GSD.description:
tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_ecn_fallback.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.56 by commit 8bcf7339f2cf70ea4461df6ea045d1aadfabfa11, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit 492135557dc090a1abb2cfbe1a412757e3ed68ab. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_ecn_fallback.
